text:
MWR InfoSecurity | London & Basingstoke UK, Johannesburg ZA | Likely ONSITE but may consider REMOTE | Ruby developers, all levels considered

Our small (<10) team maintains a suite of applications used internally within the business. We use Ruby, Rails, JS and are dabbling with React.

Interview process is usually: a phone interview, a coding task in your own time, then an in person interview with a few technical questions.

https://careers.mwrinfosecurity.com/Jobs/Advert/512543?FromS...
